name: Fashion Show
desc: The most awaited event of techNIEks wherein a lot of young boys and girls are the part of the fashion show and a definite crowed puller!

name: Special Acts
desc: Special Acts by Saravana Dhanpal. Balloon Act, Hollow Man Act, Spring Act

name: Coastal Carnival
desc: A Coastal Carnival Act by Beyond Taalas, a famous dance school in Msore

name: Speed Panting
desc: Watch the magic of an artist making the paint brush dance with the tune of music and a wonderful piece of art emerging out of it

name: Skating Dance
desc: Ever seen a dancer dancing on roller skates?? well, here's your chance to see one!

name: E-Swara Band
desc: Enthralling performance by Eswara, a Bangalore based band

name: Rock Arena
desc: A band face-off in which various band troops from across the country will take part

name: Photo Marathon
desc: An exciting event for all those who think that they are good at clicking pictures

name: Paintball
desc: Tag your opponent with colourful balloons and win exciting prizes.

name: Treasure Hunt
desc: Game about solving the clues given and moving on to the next destination until the last spot is reached. The first person to reach the end wins.
